I saw that God had been moving on hearts. The truth that a few sacrificed so much for, in order to get it before others, has triumphed, 
                                                                           249
and multitudes have laid hold of it. God has in his providence moved upon those that have means and has brought them into the truth, that as the work of God increases, the wants of the cause may be met. Much means are brought into the ranks of Sabbath-keepers.
